articles.title: Apple’s next macOS Big Sur update should make iPad apps look less awkward on the Mac - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s macOS Big Sur 11.3 update, now in beta, will let iPad apps take up more of the screen on M1 Macs. It also adds new customization options for Safari and support for the Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5 controllers.
articles.content:

articles.title: The iCloud for Windows version that let you sync Apple passwords is no longer available - The Verge
articles.description: The update of iCloud for Windows that Apple released last week is no longer available. The update enabled syncing passwords, but required a Chrome extension that wasn’t available until days after the update.
articles.content:
The features rollout has not been smooth
Apples rocky rollout of iCloud password sync on Windows has hit another bump: you can no longer download the version of the app that allowed syncing password… [+1637 chars]
